attributes.action: send the rosetta stone home to egypt, unlike the bankers, this is a crime we can put right
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
napoleon stole it, in true buckaneer style, the Brits stole it from them and took it to london for posh people to look at, 
unlike the bankers thievery and the governments chicanery, complicity and outright criminal activity...

here's a crime that we can make right for the people of egypt,
